titleStmt.title: A relation of the beginnings and proceedings of the rebellion in the county of Cavan, within the province of Ulster in Ireland, from the 23. of Octobe
titleStmt.author: Jones, Henry,

biblFull.publicationStmt: August 11. London, printed for Godfrey Emerson, and are to be sold at the signe of the Swan in Little-Britain, [London] :

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
